title: Nordis Technologies Names Paul Sykes Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer
text:
Communications and payments company expands leadership team to support rapid growth
CORAL SPRINGS, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Nordis Technologies , a leader in customer communications management technology, document delivery, and electronic bill presentment and payment solutions, has recruited Paul Sykes to be chief operating officer and chief financial officer. The company is expanding the senior leadership team to manage its fast growth.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180417005653/en/
Paul Sykes, COO and CFO, Nordis Technologies. (Photo: Business Wire)
“Paul brings to Nordis Technologies extensive financial and operational experience with high-growth, innovative technology-based businesses. Plus, his knowledge and track record in working in an entrepreneurial culture to help build those businesses makes him a real asset to our senior management team,” said Ronnie Selinger, founder, CEO and president.
Sykes previously served as CFO of DMG Information, the U.S.-based private equity unit of London’s Daily Mail and General Trust plc . During his 20-year career at DMG, Sykes played a critical role in taking the business unit from its early stages to more than $800 million in revenue. He executed more than $1 billion in acquisitions and divestitures, generating $2 billion in shareholder value. He also served on the board of each company in DMG’s portfolio, helping the businesses develop and implement aggressive growth strategies and operating efficiencies.
Prior to joining DMG, Sykes held several positions at EMAP plc, a U.K.-based diversified media group, moving up to group treasurer. He started his career as an auditor at KPMG.
Sykes, who is based in Miami, is a graduate of the University of Leicester, U.K., with a bachelor of applied science in economics. He holds the professional qualifications of Chartered Accountant of England & Wales and Associate Corporate Treasurer.
About Nordis Technologies
Nordis Technologies is a leader and innovator in providing technology solutions to solve customer communications management and payment challenges. With Nordis’ patent-pending, cloud-based Expresso application and product suite, including ExpressoPay, businesses can quickly and efficiently create and manage critical print and digital communications and payments. Nordis delivers an end-to-end solution, with state-of-the-art document delivery systems, workflow management and digital transformation solutions for communications and payments. Privately held Nordis Technologies is based in Coral Springs, Florida. For more information, visit nordistechnologies.com .
